name: Episode 11- "The Black Glove of Melchizedek" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: What country is the glove sent from?
questions.explanation:
Romania.

	The package was postmarked in Bucaresti, a city in Romania. Passepartout thinks that the glove, received by Phileas with no explantory note, must be some kind of joke.

questions.text: What is the name of Phileas's friend at the British Museum, who analyzes a picture of the glove?
questions.explanation:
James O'Neilan.

	According to James, the mystic symbols on the glove are cabalistic. James said that cabalists believed that the symbols were not just representations of God, but that God was actually contained in the ciphers.

questions.text: Where does Phileas hide the glove?
questions.explanation:
In a book.

	Phileas hides it in a book, which turns out to be a fortunate place. Late that night, someone breaks into his study to steal it. The person is unable to find it because it is so well-hidden, and Phileas scares him (or her?) off.

questions.text: In Paris, Jules meets the very man that sent the glove to Phileas. What does this friend use to "psychically connect" to Phileas?
questions.explanation:
A watch.

	To psychically connect to Phileas, Jacomb Hyde needs something that touched his flesh. Jules has a watch that Phileas leant him, so Hyde can warn Phileas to destroy the glove right away.

questions.text: What is the name of the friend that sent the glove to Phileas?
questions.explanation:
Jacomb Hyde.

	Phileas and Hyde grew up in the same village, but Hyde moved to India. They lost touch, and haven't seen each other for years.

questions.text: What colour is the rose that Wei San stabs Rebecca's hand with?
questions.explanation:
Blue.

	The thorn on the rose has a drug in it, and Rebecca passes out within minutes. Later, she wakes up in "the moon room", where Zai Chao has taken her. He has abducted her, hoping to exchange her for Phileas's very special glove.

questions.text: Who bursts into Phileas's house, demanding the glove?
questions.explanation:
Vargas.

	Vargas: "Feel my closeness, my distance, in this miracle of eternity." Fortunately for Phileas, Vargas forgets that he is mortal, and Phileas shoots him four times.

questions.text: Complete Passepartout's quote: "No. We'll be there, but not there. Like tears in the _____."
questions.explanation:
rain.

	When Phileas receives the ransom letter from Zai Chao, it instructs him to go alone. Phileas, however, decides to take Jules and Passepartout along, but they hide, so that Zai Chao's minions don't see them.

questions.text: Why does Zai Chao want the glove?
questions.correct: Once he has it, there will be no end to his powers.
options: It's a family heirloom that has been passed down through the family for generations.
It's a relic from the Ming dynasty, and he wants to sell it.
It used to belong to his great-grandfather.
questions.explanation:
Once he has it, there will be no end to his powers.

	Zai Chao is a little vague on this point, but he does tell Rebecca that he will be very powerful once he has it.

Rebecca shoots him.

	Just when he is about to vaporize Phileas, Rebecca saves the day by shooting him in the chest. She feels sympathetic when she sees how grieved Wei San, but Phileas comforts her by saying that they probably would have killed them both. Thanks for playing my quiz!
